Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder and neck section of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is partly encrusted with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394377) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394377)
